name: SlimeSlayer
description:
Your silly husband (God) has been trying his hand at being a game developer. AND YOU ARE THE BETA TESTER.

He's very please to have included some of the following features:

  •  Intractable inventory so you can try hitting stuff with anything you have
  • Extensive crafting menu ;)
  • Aggressive enemies to kill
  •  Legs (oh and a jump)

Now you've just got to get home in time for tea.

Music Credit:

Hot Pink
Podington Bear
soundofpicture.com

Have Fun!
